      • canConnect

        public boolean canConnect(org.jhotdraw.draw.connector.Connector start)
        Description copied from interface: org.jhotdraw.draw.ConnectionFigure
        Checks if this ConnectionFigure can be connect to the specified Connector. This is used to provide an early feedback to the user, when he/she creates a new connection.
        Specified by:
        canConnect in interface org.jhotdraw.draw.ConnectionFigure
        Overrides:
        canConnect in class org.jhotdraw.draw.LineConnectionFigure
